name: 08-js-service-calls
description: * start from the up-to-date main branch (`git checkout main; git pull origin main`) * Create a feature branch named 'js-service-calls' (`git checkout -b js-service-calls`) * Add and Modify the files in this directory to have the require features * Add, commit, and push the branch to github * Create a PR to merge to main * Be sure to include the TA(s) and I as reviewers.   * Due by **Sun Nov 5, 11:59pm PT**
